summary: CONSUMER STATES  REAR DOOR CHILD LOCKS WILL NOT DISENGAGE. CONSUMER REFERRED TO THE OWNERS MANUAL WHICH  STATED THAT  A SPECIAL KEY WAS NEEDED TO DISENGAGE CHILD LOCKS, HOWEVER  DEALER DID NOT PROVIDE CONSUMER WITH A KEY FOR THAT PURPOSE.  CONSUMER WAS CONCERNED THAT IN EVENT OF AN EMERGENCY  PASSENGERS WILL BE TRAPPED. *AK
